TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit OpacityConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: Provides a type converter to convert opacity values to and from a string.

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert opacity values to and from a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，你并不直接创建的实例。Typically, you do not directly create an instance of an . 而应调用方法类。Instead, you call the method of class. 有关详细信息的类型转换器并查看代码示例，请参阅基类和[如何： 实现类型转换器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters and to view code examples, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法专用于转换表示百分比或小数到其对应的值表示百分比的不透明度的值。The method is specialized to convert values that represent percentages or decimal fractions to their corresponding values, which represent the opacity as a percentage. 之外的类型传递给此方法的基类实现。Types other than are passed to the base class implementation of this method.

exception.span: The object was not a supported type for the conversion.

span.span: could not be properly converted to type .

exception.span: -or- The resulting converted was less than zero percent or greater than one hundred percent.

span.span: -or- The resulting converted was less than zero percent or greater than one hundred percent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法专用于整型将值转换为其百分比表示形式。The method is specialized to convert integral values to their percentage representations. 其他类型被传递给此方法的基类实现。Other types are passed to the base class implementation of this method.
